Articles.Content:
i know i shouldn't really be discussing this but i should mention that this isn't about .23 but the future in general...

Te point of this is because i have a feeling that if squad is going to implement a new building such as rover test facility/simulator, hey would put it in the space between the tracking station and research facility.

any thoughts?

this is discussion remember

Edit: nevermind

Edited December 10, 2013 by Helix935
Please also remember to post in the appropriate forum, also, there is already an unclickable building, so Squad could just use that
i know also again i changed the title what it is supposed to and again about that building i would more or less expect it to be used for missions or contracts for the future

The obvious questions I have to ask here are: Why do you care where future buildings will go? Does it matter?

I imagine that they will just slot buildings in wherever feels good to them at the time.

Edit: Just re-reading my posts from today, and felt that my questions here might be mis-interpreted as having a negative tone. No negativity intended, I'm just genuinely curious why it's important to you, and knowing that might allow better discussion of the topic.

Edited December 11, 2013 by Murph
I feel like there should be a building on the opposite side of the runway. For what? I don't exactly know. Maybe a weather tower or something
